entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:15 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:15 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:15 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
